modules.name: 1-Op Chaos
modules.description: Multimode audio and modulation chaos generator.

modules.name: 2-Op Chaos
modules.description: Multimode audio and modulation chaos generator.

modules.name: 3-Op Chaos
modules.description: Multimode audio and modulation chaos generator.

modules.name: ASR
modules.description: Analog shift register. Multi-stage sample and hold

modules.name: Analog to Digital
modules.description: Converts a continuous signal into eight gates representing bit values.

modules.name: Binary Gate
modules.description: Manually turn a gate on or off, or toggle its current state.

modules.name: Binary Noise
modules.description: Generates a random gate or square wave signal.

modules.name: Bitshift
modules.description: Bitshifting distortion and waveshaping effect

modules.name: Blank Panel
modules.description: A blank panel. Show your love for HetrickCV

modules.name: Boolean Logic
modules.description: Six way boolean logic processor

modules.name: Chaotic Attractors
modules.description: Multimode audio and modulation chaos generator.

modules.name: Clocked Noise
modules.description: Multimode audio and modulation noise generator.

modules.name: Comparator
modules.description: Determine whether a signal is above or below a threshold.

modules.name: Contrast
modules.description: A mild distortion that brightens up a signal.

modules.name: Crackle
modules.description: Vinyl-like noise generator ported from SuperCollider.

modules.name: Data Compander
modules.description: Compresses and expands signals with a-law or mu-law compansion.

modules.name: Delta
modules.description: Determine which direction a signal is heading.

modules.name: Digital to Analog
modules.description: Converts eight gates to a smooth signal.

modules.name: Dust
modules.description: Random impulse and noise generator ported from SuperCollider

modules.name: Exponent
modules.description: Raise a signal to a power

modules.name: Feedback Sine Chaos
modules.description: A chaotic oscillator and LFO created through phase distortion and feedback.

modules.name: Flip-Flop
modules.description: A flexible toggle switch

modules.name: Flip Pan
modules.description: A bidirectional panner, crossfader, and VCA

modules.name: Gate Delay
modules.description: Trigger input to delayed Gate output

modules.name: Gate Junction
modules.description: Eight channel gate processor.

modules.name: Gate Junction Expanded
modules.description: Eight channel gate processor, expanded with more jacks and polyphony.

modules.name: Gingerbread Chaos
modules.description: Self-modulating audio and modulation chaos generator.

modules.name: OR Logic (Gate Combiner)
modules.description: Combines multiple gates into one gate.

modules.name: Mid/Side
modules.description: Converts Left/Right signals to Mid/Side and vice versa.

modules.name: Min-Max
modules.description: Outputs the greatest and least voltages from up to 4 inputs.

modules.name: Phase Driven Sequencer
modules.description: A 16-step gate and voltage sequencer driven by a phasor.

modules.name: Phase Driven Sequencer 32
modules.description: A 32-step gate and voltage sequencer driven by a phasor.

modules.name: Phasor Analyzer
modules.description: Detects multiple movement parameters from an incoming phasor signal.

modules.name: Phasor Burst Generator
modules.description: Generates a phasor repeatedly for a given number of times.

modules.name: Phasor Divide & Multiply
modules.description: Processes a phasor signal and outputs a phasor at a precise, variable time multiple or division.

modules.name: Phasor to Euclidean
modules.description: Generates a Euclidean rhythm via a 0-5V Phasor input

modules.name: Phasor to Gates
modules.description: An 8-step gate sequencer driven by a phasor.

modules.name: Phasor to Gates 32
modules.description: A 32-step gate sequencer driven by a phasor.

modules.name: Phasor to Gates 64
modules.description: A 64-step gate sequencer driven by a phasor.

modules.name: Phasor Generator
modules.description: Generates a phasor along with time-synced gates.

modules.name: Phasor Geometry
modules.description: Processes phasor signals with useful waveshapers.

modules.name: Phasor Octature
modules.description: Takes a phasor and rotates it at 45 degree intervals.

modules.name: Phasor Quadrature
modules.description: Shapes a phasor into a sine, and outputs both phasors and sines at 90 degree intervals.

modules.name: Phasor Randomizer
modules.description: Randomizes phasor signals to create different offset patterns for sequencers.

modules.name: Phasor Ranger
modules.description: Converts HetrickCV phasor signals (and any other unipolar signal) to other useful voltage ranges.

modules.name: Phasor Reset
modules.description: Duplicates an incoming phasor, but allows you to reset it independently of the input.

modules.name: Phasor Rhythm Group
modules.description: Generates a clock by dividing a phasor into a series of triggers, and then groups the clock into two subrhythms.

modules.name: Phasor Shaper
modules.description: Processes phasor signals in interesting ways for sequence modification or phase distortion synthesis.

modules.name: Phasor Shift
modules.description: Processes phasor signals and provides a phase shifted output, optionally quantized to step distances.

modules.name: Phasor Stutter
modules.description: Processes phasor signals and adds stutters/ratchets/repeats within substeps.

modules.name: Phasor Sub-Step Shaper
modules.description: Processes individual steps of phasor signals in interesting ways for sequence modification or phase distortion synthesis.

modules.name: Phasor Timetables
modules.description: Processes a phasor signal and outputs phasors and standard timing ratios.

modules.name: Phasor To Clock
modules.description: Generates a clock by dividing a phasor into a series of gates.

modules.name: Phasor to LFO
modules.description: Shapes incoming phasor signals to useful, morphing LFO waveshapes. These waveforms are not anti-aliased, hence the LFO designation.

modules.name: Phasor to Waveforms
modules.description: Shapes incoming phasor signals to useful, static LFO waveshapes. These waveforms are not anti-aliased, hence the LFO designation.

modules.name: Probability
modules.description: Sends one gate to two places randomly.

modules.name: Random Gates
modules.description: Generates up to eight random gates.

modules.name: Rotator
modules.description: Eight-way channel rotation.

modules.name: Rungler
modules.description: 8-Bit Shift Register and Comparator with stepped signal output via bits 6, 7, and 8.

modules.name: Scanner
modules.description: 8-channel signal crossfader, mixer, scanner, and router.

modules.name: 2 To 4 Mix Matrix
modules.description: Takes two signals and generates four variations.

modules.name: Vector Mix
modules.description: Two-dimensional crossfading between four signals.

modules.name: Waveshaper
modules.description: Modulatable hyperbolic waveshaper

modules.name: XY<->Polar
modules.description: Converts XY coordinates to Polar and vice versa.
